<interact> Grip Board
<interact> Release Board
<aim> Move map cursor
<aim> Select     <uia> Toggle Sticker
<uia> Toggle Sticker
<uia> Select

Sorry, this area is still under construction.
EU: Sentitzen dugu, gune hau oraindik eraikitze-lanetan dago

game_lang_code: Please come back later.
<move> to move.
Hold <dance> to dance.
Hold <jump> to jump.
<aim> to aim your web, then hold <grapple> to grapple to a point.
EU: <aim> amaraunarekin apuntatzeko, gero mantendu <grapple> puntu batera lotzeko.

game_lang_code: Aim at a point and hold <weave> to to start spinning a web.
EU: Apuntatu puntu batera eta mantendu <weave> amarauna iruten hasteko.

game_lang_code: Now aim at a second point and release <weave> to build a bridge.
EU: Orain apuntatu bigarren puntu batera eta askatu <weave> zubi bat eraikitzeko.

game_lang_code: <laser> to shoot lasers.
Hey little spider! I got a QUEST for ya!
EU: Ei, armiarmatxo! EGITEKO bat daukat zuretzat!

game_lang_code: The QUEEN is making a new PRINCESS to make a brand new hive!
EU: ERREGINA buru-belarri dabil PRINTZESA berri bat sortu nahian, erlauntza guztiz berri bat eraikitzeko!

game_lang_code: To make a princess she needs royal jelly, and to make the jelly she needs POLLEN!
EU: Printzesa berri bat sortzeko erregina-jelea behar du, eta jelea sortzeko lore-hautsa, POLENA!

game_lang_code: Only the best pollen - PINK ORCHID POLLEN! 20 Grains should do it.
EU: Goi-mailako polena soilik - ORKIDEA ARROSAREN POLENA! Nahikoa du 20 alerekin.

game_lang_code: If you bring that up to Canopy's Peak, I bet she'd love ya! Come on!
EU: Ale horiek Zuhaitzetako Gainera eramaten badituzu asko poztuko da! Ekin ba lanari!

game_lang_code: Bring 20 pollen to the QUEEN
Oh, G'day there!
Are you on the quest for pollen too?
EU: Zu ere polena biltzeko lanetan zabiltza?

game_lang_code: I hope we get enough. I can't wait to meet the new PRINCESS!
EU: Ea behar beste biltzen dugun. PRINTZESA berria ezagutzeko irrikitan nago!

game_lang_code: Sure is tiring flying all over this forest though.
EU: Baina ez da lan erraza baso osoa hegan zeharkatzea.

game_lang_code: You go on ahead without me. I'll catch up!
EU: Zoaz, ez nire zain gelditu. Laster jarraituko dut nik ere!

game_lang_code: Hullo hullo! You're a weird lookin' bee aintcha?
EU: Iepe iepe! Bai erle bitxia zarena!

game_lang_code: Must have pretty good wings to have flown up to this branch though.
EU: Baina hegal onak izango dituzu, bestela ez zinateke adar honetaraino igotzeko gai izango.

game_lang_code: Let's fly over this gap together! I wanna see your technique!
EU: Egin dezagun hegan hutsarte hau gainditzeko! Hegan egiteko zure teknika ikusi nahi dut!

game_lang_code: Well that sure is a weird way to fly!
EU: Alajaina, hori bai dela hegan egiteko era berezia!

game_lang_code: Can't argue with results though...
EU: Baina argi dago helburua lortzeko balio dizula...

game_lang_code: You keep on doing your weird flying, and good luck with the POLLEN QUEST!
EU: Segi aurrera hegakera bitxi horrekin, eta zorte on POLENAREN BILAKETArekin!

game_lang_code: Hmmm...
You seen all these fruit flies buzzing about?
EU: Ikusi dituzu ozpin-euli guzti horiek batetik bestera burrunbaka?

game_lang_code: Prrreetty annoying...
I bet someone like you could catch 'em in your webs and eat 'em...
EU: Ziur zu moduko batek ez duela arazorik haiek amaraunean harrapatu eta jateko...

game_lang_code: Just sayin'...
Wouldn't complain...
EU: Ez nintzateke kexatuko hala egingo bazenu...

game_lang_code: Good job dealing with those pests, little spider.
EU: Lan bikaina egin duzu izurrite horren kontra, armiarmatxo.

game_lang_code: Much more peaceful around here now.
EU: Orain inguru hau askoz lasaiago dago.

game_lang_code: Oh hey again!
Glad to see you took me up on the POLLEN QUEST!
EU: Pozten nau POLENAREN BILAKETAn parte hartzea onartu duzula ikusteak!

game_lang_code: Canopy's peak is just a bit further this way.
EU: Zuhaitzetako Gaina gertu dago bide honetatik jarraituz.

game_lang_code: I hope you get the 20 we need! The QUEEN is waiting!
EU: Espero dut beharrezko 20 aleak lortuko dituzula! ERREGINA zain duzu!

game_lang_code: Look it's the little spider!
I heard you've been helping out with the POLLEN QUEST!
EU: Entzun dut POLENAREN BILAKETAn laguntzen aritu zarela!

game_lang_code: If you've got your 20 grains, go on in.
EU: Dagoeneko bildu badituzu 20 aleak, sartu barrura.

game_lang_code: The QUEEN awaits!
Welcome to my hive, little spider.
I've heard so much about you!
EU: Asko hitz egin didate zuri buruz!

game_lang_code: Have you brought the pollen for the Princess' royal jelly?
EU: Ekarri al duzu printzesaren erregina-jelearentzako beharrezko polena?

game_lang_code: Ah... not quite, dear spider.
EU: Ai... ez dago behar beste, armiarmatxo.

game_lang_code: Don't worry, I'm sure there are more orchids out there.
EU: Ez kezkatu, ziur naiz orkidea gehiago daudela kanpoaldean.

game_lang_code: Come back when you've found 20, okay deary?
EU: Buelta zaitez 20 ale batzean, ados, laztana?

game_lang_code: Oh my! Look at all the pollen you've collected!
EU: Ai ama! Baina zenbat polen bildu duzu!

game_lang_code: Such a bounty must be properly rewarded.
EU: Halako uztak bere neurriko ordainsaria behar du.

game_lang_code: Perhaps you should be considered a princess in your own right.
EU: Agian printzesa izendatu beharko zinduket, ondo merezia duzu.

game_lang_code: Take this, princess spider.
You've more than earned it.
Now wait here a moment, while we prepare the royal jelly for my daughter.
EU: Itxaron hemen une batez alabarentzat erregina-jelea prestatzen dudan bitartean.

game_lang_code: Oh yes! This shall make a powerful jelly.
EU: Oi bai! Honekin jele ahaltsua egin ahalko dut.

game_lang_code: The new Princess will be magnificent!
Wait here a moment while we prepare her.
EU: Itxaron hemen une batez bera prest izan arte.

game_lang_code: I am sure she would love to meet you.
Hello again, dear spider.
Hello again, princess spider.
I did not expect to see you back here.
EU: Ez nuen espero hona itzuliko zinenik.

game_lang_code: I hope my daughter has been treating you well.
EU: Espero dut nire alabak ondo tratatuko zaituela.

game_lang_code: Now then...
Did you need a lift back to your tree?
EU: Zure zuhaitzera hegan eraman zaitzadan nahi duzu?

game_lang_code: Well please feel free to stay as long as you like
EU: Nahi beste denbora egon zaitezke gure artea.

game_lang_code: Wait one moment deary.
The princess is on her way to pick you up
EU: Printzesa bidean da. Zure bila dator.

game_lang_code: BEEHOLD!
Your PRINCESS has arrived!
She's so beautiful!
Such powerful wings!
Thank you all for your hard labour, preparing my royal jelly.
EU: Milesker guztioi niretzako erregina-jelea prestatzeko egindako lan gogorragatik.

game_lang_code: Dear spider, my mother told me of your predicament as I lay in my cell.
EU: Armiarma maitea, amak esan dit erlazuloan nengoen bitartean zeinen fin aritu zaren lanean.

game_lang_code: You're planning a rescue mission to a magic island in the sky?
EU: Erreskate-misio bat prestatzen zabiltza, zeruko uharte magiko batean?

game_lang_code: I can think of no greater adventure with which to stretch my new wings!
EU: Abentura ezin hobea dirudi nire hegal berriak luzatzeko, alajaina!

game_lang_code: Come with me. I will take you home and help prepare for our voyage.
EU: Zatoz nirekin. Etxera eramango zaitut, eta gure bidaiarako prestatzen lagunduko.

game_lang_code: So this is the balloon that's supposed to take us to the magic island in the sky?
EU: Beraz, hau da zeruko uharte magiko hartaraino igoko gaituen globoa?

game_lang_code: It'll never make it in this condition!
EU: Duen egoera tamalgarriarekin, ez dut uste iritsiko denik!

game_lang_code: Let me fix that up for you!
Ta Da!
We shouldn't have any problems now. These wax patches are completely airtight!
EU: Orain ez genuke inolako arazorik izan beharko. Argizarizko adabakiak guztiz hermetikoak dira!

game_lang_code: I'm ready when you are little spider!
EU: Gertu nago, zuk nahi duzunean, armiarmatxo!

game_lang_code: Can't wait for our big adventure!
Yes! Now this is what I call an adventure!
EU: Bai! Hau bai dela benetako abentura!

game_lang_code: Hold on tight, little spider!
But don't worry, I'll catch you if you fall!
EU: Baina ez kezkatu, erortzen bazara nik harrapatuko zaitut!

game_lang_code: The wind is really picking up now!
I feel so alive!
This is it! The Sky Bower!
EU: Iritsi gara! Hau da Zeruko Pergola!

game_lang_code: The airship won't be able to make it any further with this storm raging.
EU: Aireontziak ezingo du aurrera egin ekaitz bortitz honekin.

game_lang_code: You'll have to continue without us.
Go! Find your love!
We'll meet you on the other side!
Find your boyfriend in the Sky Bower
Escape the Sky Bower with your boyfriend
EU: Egin ihes Zeruko Pergolatik mutil-lagunarekin batera

game_lang_code: Little spider! You made it!
And you've rescued your boyfriend!
We're almost ready to go home.
Vlad is just bringing the airship around now.
EU: Vlad aireontzia honantz gidatzen ari da.

game_lang_code: Wait...
He's coming! Watch out!
Oh, he is NOT getting away with that again!
EU: Oi, ez, EZ da berriro berearekin aterako!

game_lang_code: Hold on little spider!
We're going to catch this bird!
Defeat the Bowerbird
Canopy's Peak 5,000cm
Canopy's Peak 4,700cm
Canopy's Peak 4,200cm
Canopy's Peak 3,600cm
Canopy's Peak 3,500cm
Canopy's Peak 2,350cm
Canopy's Peak 2,200cm

Canopy's Peak 1,200cm
Canopy's Peak 500cm

Propellant Pump

Pump Power Station

Engineering
Warning: Landslides
context: Sign text outside one way slide to ant nest

game_lang_code: Behold, predator! I am The Fly Lord!
Your fangs are too small to devour me!
EU: Zure letaginak txikiegiak dira ni irensteko!

game_lang_code: If my kin don't sit well in your stomach, come speak with me again.
EU: Etor zaitez nigana bueltan nire ahaideek urdaileko mina ematen dizutenean.

game_lang_code: We'll see what we can do about that...
How many little flies you got in that tum, predator?
EU: Zenbat eulitxo sartu dituzu zure sabel horretan, harraparia?

game_lang_code: None? Well colour me surprised!
EU: Bat ere ez? Hau bai ez nuela espero!

game_lang_code: If you end up with any prisoners in there, come on back okay?
EU: Norbait sabelean harrapatzen baduzu, itzuli nigana, ados?

game_lang_code: Well... not for long!
Haha! Fly free friends!
Fly free!
If my kin don't sit well in your stomach, come pay me a visit.
EU: Nire ahaideek urdaileko mina ematean, zatoz nigana bueltan.

game_lang_code: What? You haven't eaten even a single fly?
EU: Zer? Ez duzu euli bakar bat ere jan?

game_lang_code: Well, perhaps I judged you too harshly.
Be on your way, spider. And stay away from temptation.
Greetings, spider.
I appreciate your visit, and your continued virtue.
EU: Eskertzen dut zure bisita, eta zure bertute apurtezina.

game_lang_code: Oh... How tragically predictable.
You just couldn't help yourself, could you?
EU: Ezin izan diozu tentaldiari eutsi, e?

game_lang_code: I'll free you of your burden of course.
But know this, spider: I am disappointed in you.
EU: Baina jakizu, armiarma: desengainua hartu dut zurekin.

game_lang_code: Well if it isn't the mighty predator.
EU: Nor dugu hemen, ez al da ba harrapari ahaltsua!

game_lang_code: Feeling a little full?
Let's see if we can't free some of those you've imprisoned.
EU: Ikustagun, ea barru horretatik norbait aska dezakegun.

game_lang_code: Haha! Fly my friends!
Fly free!
Begone, predator!
There's nothing for you to eat here.
You...
You monster!
You ate every last one of them!
I curse you, predator!
You shall know the pain of the fly!
Greetings Comrade spider!
I hear you've got some problems that could use an ant solution.
EU: Entzun dut zure arazoak konpontzeko inurrion soluzio bat behar duzula.

game_lang_code: We'd love to help out, but we're still recovering from the latest fire ant raid.
EU: Gustura lagunduko genizuke, baina oraindik suzko inurrien azken oldarraldiko kalteak konpontzen gabiltza.

game_lang_code: The workers could really use some extra help down there, if you've got time.
EU: Langileek atseginez hartuko lukete laguntza pixkat behe horretan, astirik baduzu behintzat.

game_lang_code: Speak with Comrade Carl in the Mech-Ant chamber.
EU: Hitz egin Carl burkidearekin, Inurri Mekanikoaren ganberan dago.

game_lang_code: She'll be able to give you some work.
Talk to Comrade Carl in the Mech-Ant chamber
EU: Hitz egin Carl burkidearekin, Inurri Mekanikoaren ganberan.

game_lang_code: We appreciate you coming by. Volunteers are always welcome!
EU: Asko eskertzen dizugu etorri izana. Boluntarioak beti dira ongi etorriak!

game_lang_code: Well well, if it isn't the brand new Engineer!
EU: Hara, hara, hara, hemen dugu gure ingeniari berria!

game_lang_code: We appreciate the assist.
The team has already arrived to work on that problem of yours.
EU: Dagoeneko abiatu da talde bat zure arazo horretan lan egitera.

game_lang_code: Go see Lead Engineer Vlad, up by the baloon.
EU: Zoaz Vlad ingeniari-burua ikustera, globoan dago.

game_lang_code: Oh! Greetings Comrade!
I'm not sure how you snuck by me before...
EU: Ez dakit nola ez zaitudan lehenago ikusi...

game_lang_code: But we appreciate the assist!
EU: Baina asko eskertzen dizugu laguntzera etortzea!

game_lang_code: We've sent a team up ahead to work on that problem of yours.
EU: Talde bat bidali dugu gora, zure arazoarekin laguntzera.

game_lang_code: But don't be gone too long!
The colony still needs help finishing the Mech-Ant!
EU: Koloniak oraindik laguntza behar du Inurri Mekanikoa eraikitzeko!

game_lang_code: Hey Comrade!
Don't be gone too long!
Oh dear!
That was quite the fall we had!
Things are a bit crazy around the nest right now.
EU: Nahaste handia dago une honetan habia inguruan.

game_lang_code: We'd love you're help, if you're willing!
EU: Izugarri eskertuko dugu zure laguntza, hartarako prest bazaude!

game_lang_code: Go see Comrade Carl in the Mech-Ant chamber.
EU: Zoaz Carl burkidearekin hitz egitera, Inurri Mekanikoaren ganberara.

game_lang_code: She'll know what to do.
Talk to Comrade Carl in the Mech-Ant chamber.
EU: Hitz egin Carl burkidearekin, Inurri Mekanikoaren ganberan.

game_lang_code: Ouch!
This mudslide is getting dangerous!
EU: Lur-jausi hau gero eta arriskutsuagoa da!

game_lang_code: I was trying to repair this power station to open up access to the pumps.
EU: Argindar-estazioa konpondu nahian nenbilen, ponpetara sarbidea irekitzeko.

game_lang_code: But I slipped and fell!
EU: Baina irristatu eta beheraino erori naiz!

game_lang_code: Could you lend me a mandible?
Think you could give me a lift out of this ditch?
Thanks for helping me out!
You're a true friend.
Now I just need to find a way to fix this gearbox...
EU: Orain engranaje-kaxa hori konpontzeko modua bilatu behar dut...

game_lang_code: You here to help with the elevator?
It's been broken down since the attack, but I can't reach the part we need to fix it.
EU: Erasoalditik ez du funtzionatzen, eta ezin dut konpondu ahal izateko beharrezko pieza eskuratu.

game_lang_code: If you can get me the brass cog from the other side of this chamber
EU: Ganbararen beste aldean dagoen letoizko engranajea ekartzen badidazu...

game_lang_code: we should be able to get it running.
Without that elevator, we're stuck up here.
EU: Igogailurik gabe, hemen goian harrapaturik gaude.

game_lang_code: Fix the elevator with a brass cog
There's no way down from here without that elevator.
EU: Ez dago behera jaisteko modurik igogailurik gabe.

game_lang_code: Thanks Comrade. I'll deliver the cog back to the main shaft.
EU: Eskerrik asko, burkide. Engranajea berriro ardatz nagusira eramango dut.

game_lang_code: Just pop it into the gearbox and we should be good.
EU: Hartu eta koka ezazu engranaje-kaxan, eta funtzionatu beharko luke.

game_lang_code: Thanks again for fixing the elevator!
Oh, you fixed the drawbridge already?
EU: O, dagoeneko zubi altxagarria konpondu duzu?

game_lang_code: Oh, thank goodness you're here!
The fire ants hit this place pretty hard.
EU: Suzko inurriek inguru hau guztiz suntsitu dute.

game_lang_code: Luckily this drawbridge kept them out of the living quarters.
EU: Zorionez, zubi altxagarri honi esker ezin izan dira bizitegira iritsi.

game_lang_code: But they damaged the control mechanism, and now I'm stuck on the wrong side.
EU: Baina kontrol-mekanismoa hondatu dute, eta orain okerreko aldean harrapaturik nago.

game_lang_code: Could you help me repair it?
Could you help me repair the drawbridge?
Outstanding work!
Now that the rest of the colony can get through, we can start fixing this place up.
EU: Orain, koloniako beste kideak hemendik igaro daitezkenez, leku hau konpontzen has gaitezke.

game_lang_code: G'day Comrade!
Everyone here is getting really thirsty from all the hard work they've been doing.
EU: Mundu guztia egarriz dago, egindako lan gogorraren ondorioz.

game_lang_code: Do you think you could turn the water back on so we can have a drink?
EU: Saia zaitezke ur-emaria berrezartzen, tragoxka bat hartu ahal dezagun?

game_lang_code: Have you been down to the water pump yet?
Many thanks Comrade! The ants around these chambers are now comfortably hydrated!
EU: Milesker, burkide! Ganbera hauetako inurriak orain behar bezain hidrataturik daude!

game_lang_code: Oh, um, hello Comrade...
I'm sorry if I seem distracted, its just...
It appears that a few larvae have gone missing in the chaos.
EU: Anabasa honetan larba gutxi batzuk galdu direla dirudi.

game_lang_code: The fire ants have spread us thin and we don't have the antpower to search for them.
EU: Suzko inurriek gure kolonia urritu dute, eta ez daukagu larben bila joateko nahikoa kide.

game_lang_code: Would you keep an eye out for any that might be hidden about the nest?
EU: Baduzu inguruan begiratzerik, ea habian zehar gordetakoak aurkitzen dituzun?

game_lang_code: Return the ant larvae to the nursury
Oh you found some already?
That's excellent!
Hello again Comrade.
Have you found any of the missing larvae?
Oh... well...
Oh thank you, Comrade!
Unfortunately, there are still more out there.
Please keep looking. They could be anywhere.
EU: Mesedez, jarraitu bila. Edonon egon litezke.

game_lang_code: Those fire ants are pretty sneaky with their hidden chambers.
EU: Suzko inurri horiek ezkutuko ganberatan zehar ibiltzen dira.

game_lang_code: Thats... That's all the larvae!
Spectacular!
We are so greatful for your help!
These larvae will grow safely in the nest, despite the best attempts of the fire ants.
EU: Larba hauek habiaren babespean haziko dira, suzko inurrien asmo txarretatik salbu.

game_lang_code: These larvae will soon grow into big, strong ants!
EU: Larba hauek laster hazi eta inurri handi eta indartsu bihurtuko dira!

game_lang_code: The colony owes you a great debt.
Greetings Comrade! Did Comrade Mark recruit you from the surface?
EU: Kaixo, burkide! Mark burkideak errekrutatu zaitu lurrazalean?

game_lang_code: Fantastic!
No? Well, it's good to have you anyway!
EU: Ez? Berdin dio, ongi etorria zara!

game_lang_code: There's tonnes of work to do to finish the Mech-Ant!
EU: Sekulako lan eskerga dago egiteko Inurri Mekanikoa bukatzeko!

game_lang_code: Let's see...
The mandibles need a final heat treatment up in the forge room...
EU: Barailek azken tratamendu bat behar dute forja-gelan...

game_lang_code: Attach mandibles to Mech-Ant
Put the mandibles through the forge
But to turn that back on we need to patch up the pipeworks.
EU: Baina berriro martxan jartzeko, aurrena hoditeria konpondu behar dugu.

game_lang_code: Reconnect the propellant pipes
We'll need that to supply the Mech-Ant too...
EU: Hori ere beharko dugu Inurri Mekanikoa hornitzeko...

game_lang_code: Reconnect the water pipes
Oh, and it still needs 3 more legs to be attached!
EU: O, eta beste 3 hankak lotu beharko zaizkio!

game_lang_code: I think we're waiting on deliveries for 2 of them from engineering.
EU: Uste dut ingeniaritzakoek 2 hanka ekarri zain gaudela.

game_lang_code: Connect Mech-Ant legs
Well what are you waiting for, Comrade?
Get to it!
I've given you a whole list of tasks already!
EU: Dagoeneko egitekoen zerrenda potolo bat eman dizut!

game_lang_code: What are you standing around for?
HEY!
Looking good, Comrade!
Get over here and let's have a talk!
Hold up a second, Comrade.
The platoon is moving out!
Wow! What a beautiful display!
Comrade spider, we're making you an honorary member of the engineering corps for your service today!
EU: Armiarma burkidea, gaurko laguntza eskertzeko ingeniaritza gorputzeko ohorezko kide izendatuko zaitugu!

game_lang_code: And I've sent a workforce ahead to help out with your mission on the surface.
EU: Eta lantalde bat eratu dut lurrazaleko zure egitekoan lagun zaitzaten.

game_lang_code: They'll have that balloon up and flying before you know it!
EU: Konturatu orduko globo hori airean hegan jarriko dute!

game_lang_code: Dismissed!
Our workers are waiting for you at Moth's tree.
EU: Gure langileak Sitsaren zuhaitzean dituzu zain.

game_lang_code: Oi! Watch where you're moving that!
That's still way too hot for me to deliver.
EU: Hori oraindik beroegi dago nik entregatzeko.

game_lang_code: Go quench it in the vat over there.
EU: Sar ezazu horko andel horretan itzal dadin.

game_lang_code: You'll have to go reconnect the water supply so we can get a good quench in here.
EU: Ur-emaria birkonektatu beharko duzu forjatutako piezak itzali ahal izateko.

game_lang_code: G'day, Comrade!
The fuel lines are running dry right now.
EU: Ez dator erregai tantarik hodietatik une honetan.

game_lang_code: You'll have to get the pumps reconnected before we can do any heat treatment.
EU: Ponpak birkonektatu beharko dituzu bero-tratamenduren bat egin aurretik.

game_lang_code: Head over to the pipeworks.
The oven's all heated up for us.
Can you lend us a web to send these mandibles through the forge?
EU: Utziko diguzu amaraun pixka bat barailak forjatik igarotzeko?

game_lang_code: Oh, sorry!
That leg isn't complete yet.
EU: Hanka hori oraindik bukatu gabe dago.

game_lang_code: You'll have to attach the thigh to the shin up there before I can deliver it.
EU: Izterra han goiko bernazakiarekin lotu beharko duzu entregatu ahal izateko.

game_lang_code: Hey fellow engineer!
I'm Vlad, your airship mechanic!
We're almost ready for the trip of a lifetime!
EU: Ia prest gaude gure biziko bidaiari ekiteko!

game_lang_code: Here, take these blueprints. We've got lots to do!
EU: Tori, hartu plano hauek. Asko dago egiteko!

game_lang_code: Here's the rest of our preflight checklist:
EU: Hau da hegaldia baino lehen egin beharrekoen zerrenda:

game_lang_code: - Find a way to patch up the balloon.
EU: - Bilatu globoko zuloak konpontzeko eraren bat.

game_lang_code: I heard the bees to the East might be able to help with that.
EU: Entzun dut Ekialdeko erleak lagungarri izan daitezkeela horretan.

game_lang_code: - Talk to the princess about sealing up the balloon.
- Find a fuel source. Some good, concentrated dung would work.
EU: - Bilatu erregai-iturri bat. Kalitatezko gorotz kontzentratuak balio beharko luke.

game_lang_code: See if you can find some to the West.
EU: Begiratu ea Mendebaldean ezer aurkitzen duzun.

game_lang_code: - Attach engine immediately below the mouth of the balloon.
- Load a ball of dung into the engine.
- Firmly secure pilot platform to balloon.
Just follow the blueprints, and come see me when it's all together.
EU: Jarraitu planoetako argibideak, eta jakinaraz nazazu guztia lotuta egotean.

game_lang_code: Oh, and if you run into any trouble, just shoot the work bell and we'll reset everything for you!
EU: O, eta arazorik baduzu, jo laneko kanpaia eta guztia lehengo egoerara bueltatuko dugu!

game_lang_code: Looks like the airship is ready to launch!
Are you ready to head out? It might be a while before we can return.
EU: Abiatzeko prest zaude? Denboraldi bat emango dugu kanpoan.

game_lang_code: No worries. Come see me again when you're ready.
EU: Lasai. Zatoz nigana abiatzeko prest egotean.

game_lang_code: Alright Comrade.
Engine ignition in Three...
Two...
One!
Huh... that launch didn't quite work as expected...
EU: Hara... aireratze hau ez da espero bezala joan...

game_lang_code: Maybe something wasn't tied up quite right?
EU: Agian zerbait ez zegoen oso ondo lotua...

game_lang_code: Don't worry! We can try again!
Engine nominal, airspeed increasing!
This is it! We're flying!
Woah! This storm was NOT on our forecast!
EU: Uooa! Ekaitz hau EZ zegoen iragarria!

game_lang_code: But the ship is still holding... barely...
EU: Baina ontziak oraindik osorik dirau... kostata...

game_lang_code: You stay safe, Comrade.
We'll keep the engine running for you.
Sorry we're late, Comrade!
Just picked up a little help on the way!
Hey neighbour!
Mech-Ant 1 reporting for duty!
This beast doesn't stand a chance!
We're coming in close now!
You'll have to pull the Mech-Ant onto the bird's back with your webs!
EU: Inurri Mekanikoa amaraunarekin txoriaren bizkarrera lotu beharko duzu!

game_lang_code: Let's do this!
I'm in position, get clear!
Detaching Mech-Ant...
Now!
We did it! The beast is grounded!
What should we do with him now, Comrade?
EU: Zer egingo dugu orain berekin, burkide?

game_lang_code: We send him away!
You hear me, bird?
You've burnt all your bridges here.
The bugs of this bush will not put up with you eating and kidnapping their friends!
EU: Baso honetako zomorroek ez dute onartuko zuk beste inor jan edo bahitzerik!

game_lang_code: And now we have the means to defend ourselves.
You need to find a new land to call home.
EU: Etxetzat hartzeko lur berri bat aurkitu beharko duzu.

game_lang_code: Maybe somewhere far away from here with more birds like you.
EU: Agian hemendik urruti dagoen lurren bat, zu moduko txori gehiago daudena.

game_lang_code: Maybe somewhere you can finally find a friend...
EU: Agian, azkenean, zuretzako lagun bat aurkitzeko moduko lekuren bat...

game_lang_code: But you leave now!
Before I change my mind...
EU: Zoaz nik iritziz aldatu baino lehen...

game_lang_code: Oh my... that was scary!
I wasn't sure I'd be able to talk to him, but I did it!
EU: Ez nuen uste berari hala hitz egiteko gai izango nintzenik, baina egin dut!

game_lang_code: Thank you, buddy.
And thank you too, buddy's boyfriend!
EU: Eta milesker zuri ere, laguntxoaren mutil-lagun!

game_lang_code: Your brave actions gave me the courage to finally stand up to that menace!
EU: Zuen ekintza ausartek mehatxu horri aurre egiteko adorea eman didate!

game_lang_code: Our home is a little bit safer today, thanks to you.
EU: Gure etxea orain pixkat seguruagoa da, zuei esker.

game_lang_code: Work has been tough since the fire ants raided.
EU: Gogor lan egin behar izan dugu suzko inurrien oldarralditik hona.

game_lang_code: Comrade Freddy is the oldest ant in the nest!
EU: Freddy burkidea habiako inurririk zaharrena da!

game_lang_code: She's an ANTique!
Gotta keep moving!
Have you seen the Mech-Ant?
It's quite a marvel!
G'day!
Can't talk right now, sorry!
EU: Orain ezin dut hitz egin, barkatu!

game_lang_code: I don't like leaving the nest.
I'm not very independANT
Reporting for duty!
We're going to show those fire ants!
EU: Suzko inurri horiei eskarmentua emango diegu!

game_lang_code: Ready to serve!
Thanks for helping with the assembly.
I'm still going through the checklist in here!
Hey buddy...
I'm so sorry. I saw what happened to your boyfriend.
EU: Sentitzen dut. Ikusi dut zer gertatu zaion zure mutil-lagunari.

game_lang_code: That big mean bird has been menacing the land below its Sky Bower for years.
EU: Txoritzar zital hori bere Zeruko Pergolaren azpiko lurra mehatxatzen aritu da urte luzez.

game_lang_code: It devoured many of my siblings... but I think it has something else in mind for your beau.
EU: Senide asko irentsi dizkit... baina uste dut bestelako asmoak dituela zure maitearentzat.

game_lang_code: The bird loves to collect blue gems, you see.
EU: Txori horrek gogoko du harribitxi urdinak biltzea, izan ere.

game_lang_code: And that love of yours is the shiniest blue I've ever seen!
EU: Eta zure bikotearen urdina bezain distiratsurik ez dut aspaldian ikusi!

game_lang_code: Hmm... Come by my old nest, little buddy. I may have an idea!
EU: Hmm... Zatoz nire habia zaharrera, lagun txikia. Uste dut ideia bat daukadala!

game_lang_code: Okay, so this big ball of silk may not look like much, but it was my home for a time.
EU: Begira, zetazko bola erraldoi honek ez du beste munduko itxurarik, baina aldi baterako nire etxea izan zen.

game_lang_code: The ants below have approached me with reckless plans to turn it into a "heated air ship" as part of their defence effort.
EU: Behean bizi diren inurriek ez naute bakean uzten, etengabe aurkezten dizkidate zetazko bola "beroarekin mugituko den aireontzi" bihurtzeko plan zoroak, haien babes-sistema gisa.

game_lang_code: I've not let them try it so far, but perhaps a little recklessness is what we need right now.
EU: Orain arte ez diet halakorik egiteko baimenik eman, baina baliteke zorakeria pittin bat izatea une honetan behar duguna.

game_lang_code: If you helped them build this ship, it could take you to the Sky Bower above to rescue your boyfriend!
EU: Ontzi hori eraikitzen laguntzen badiezu, goi hartan dagoen Zeruko Pergolaraino gidatuko zaitut, zure mutil-laguna erreskata dezazun.

game_lang_code: Get help from the ants
You'll need some fuel too of course. I'd look to the dung beetles on the hill for that.
EU: Erregairen bat ere beharko duzu, noski. Esango nuke inguru honetako erregairik onena muinoko kakalardoek biltzen duten gorotza dela.

game_lang_code: Find some fuel
And naturally a guide is important for any adventure! Perhaps a bee? Nobody knows these skies better than them!
EU: Eta jakina, edozein abenturak gida on bat eskatzen du! Erle bat, akaso? Inork ez ditu zeru-inguru hauek haiek baino hobeto ezagutzen!

game_lang_code: Befriend a guide
Yes!
This is a good plan!!
Go on, little buddy, there's no time to waste!
EU: Ekiozu, laguntxo, ez dugu galtzeko astirik!

game_lang_code: Get out there! Make some friends, and save your love!
EU: Arakatu inguruak! Egin lagunak, eta salbatu zure maitea!

game_lang_code: I see you've befriended a royal from Canopy's Peak!
EU: Ikusten dut Zuhaitzetako Gaineko erregetzaren lagun egin zarela!

game_lang_code: I expected the bees would be interested in your rescue effort.
EU: Pentsatzen nuen bai erleei zure erreskate-ahaleginak interesatuko zitzaizkiela.

game_lang_code: They've always fancied adventures through the sky.
Maybe this new princess will drive out the bird and build her hive over that horrible Sky Bower!
EU: Agian printzesa berriak txoritzarra kanporatuko du, eta erlauntza berria eraikiko Zeruko Pergola zantar horren gainean!

game_lang_code: That would be a happy day indeed!
EU: Ospatzeko moduko eguna izango da hori!

game_lang_code: Hi Buddy! These ants showed up just ahead of you.
EU: Aupa laguntxo! Inurri hauek zu iritsi baino une bat lehenago azaldu dira.

game_lang_code: Made quick work of the tree!
They've been badgering me with these designs for ages, but I've not had the courage to let them try it.
EU: Aspaldian dabiltza diseinu horrekin bueltaka ni gogaitzen, baina gaur arte ez naiz inoiz ausartu baimena ematera.

game_lang_code: I'm glad you're helping each other though. Their plans seem solid... even if they're too bold for me!
EU: Pozten nau elkar laguntzen ari zaretela ikusteak. Haien planak itxura ona dauka... nire gusturako setatsuegiak diren arren!

game_lang_code: Wow! What a dramatic entrance!
Looks like I have another new friend to share this tree with.
EU: Badirudi zuhaitz hau partekatzeko adiskide berri bat aurkitu dudala.

game_lang_code: He doesn't seem to be leaving anytime soon.
EU: Ez dirudi laster alde egiteko asmoa duenik.

game_lang_code: And you have all the fuel you'd ever need to go save your boyfriend!
EU: Eta zuk mutil-laguna salbatzera joateko behar zenuen erregai guztia lortu duzu!

game_lang_code: This day is looking up for us, hey buddy?
EU: Gaurko eguna gure alde dugu, ezta, laguntxo?

game_lang_code: Well buddy, it looks like you've got all you need to head out now.
EU: Tira, laguntxo, dirudienez behar duzun guztia daukazu erreskatera abiatzeko.

game_lang_code: I wish you and your boyfriend a swift reunion!
Good luck!
Good luck on your journey!
You found one of my webs!
Bet you can't find my next one!
Later!
Find all the golden webs
You again?
I better get better at hiding these!
EU: Hauek hobeto ezkutatzen hasi beharko naiz!

game_lang_code: No way you'll find my next one!
No way!
You found me again!
You must have great eyesight!
I'll have to put my all into the next spot.
EU: Hurrengo gordelekua ondo bilatu beharko dut.

game_lang_code: Wow, okay, I give up!
EU: Zer? Aski da, amore ematen dut!

game_lang_code: You're obviously going to find me wherever I hide!
EU: Argi dago edonon ezkutatzen naizela ere, aurkituko nauzula!

game_lang_code: Here, take your prize.
Congratulations, hide and seek champion!
Oh gosh! Have you seen any little spiders around here?
EU: Oi, ez! Ikusi duzu armiarma-kumerik inguruan?

game_lang_code: My babies got startled when that big bird flew by and they've scattered all over the bush!
EU: Ene kumeak ikaratu egin dira txoritzar hori hegan azaldu denean, eta basoan zehar barreiatu dira!

game_lang_code: Please, if you find any, bring them back to me!
EU: Arren, ikusten badituzu, ekar itzazu nigana!

game_lang_code: They're too young to be off on their own.
Return the wolf spider's babies
My babies!
Oh thank you so much!
These little ones ballooned off when that big bird flew by.
EU: Ene txikitxoek ihes egin dute txoritzar hori hegan azaldu denean.

game_lang_code: But they're far too young to be off on their own.
EU: Baina gazteegiak dira euren kabuz ibiltzeko.

game_lang_code: If you find the others, please bring them back to me!
My babies are out there!
EU: Ene kumeak hor zehar daude, bakar-bakarrik!

game_lang_code: Please help me find them.
Thanks for getting these little ones back to me!
I'm still looking for the rest of them.
But together we'll surely bring them all home safely!
EU: Ziur bion artean denak sano eta salbu etxeratuko ditugula!

game_lang_code: 40! That's all of them!
If I never see another bird, it'll be too soon!
EU: Inoiz gehiago txoririk ez ikustea espero dut!

game_lang_code: Thank you so much for helping me find these little rascals.
If you ever need help, you just call, okay?
EU: Inoiz laguntza behar baduzu, deitu besterik ez duzu, ados?

game_lang_code: Thanks again for helping me find these little rascals.
EU: Milesker berriro bihurri hauek bilatzen laguntzeagatik.

game_lang_code: Hey there little spider!
You heard about dung?
Tasty, nutritious, and burns extra hot!
EU: Zaporetsua da, nutritiboa, eta berebiziko indarra ematen dizu!

game_lang_code: You want some?
Well you're in luck! We've got some friends with loads of dung to share!
EU: Tira, zorteko zaude! Zurekin partekatzeko gorotz mordoa duten lagun batzuk ezagutzen ditut!

game_lang_code: Just... uhh... not here...
EU: Baina... eee... ez dira hemen bizi...

game_lang_code: Its up the hill a fair way.
EU: Maldan gora dexente igota bizi dira.

game_lang_code: And, well, there's one small problem with getting up there...
EU: Eta, tira, arazotxo bat dago hara igotzea eragozten duena...

game_lang_code: Oh get to the point, Michael!
Look, we need to get across these puddles, and I broke my wing a while back.
EU: Hara, putzu hauek zeharkatu behar ditugu nahitaez, baina hegala hautsia daukat.

game_lang_code: No flying means we're in need of a walking based solution.
EU: Hegan egin ezin dudanez, oinezko bide bat bilatu beharko dugu.

game_lang_code: Think you could use your fancy web skills to string us a bridge outa them sticks?
EU: Zer diozu, zure ehule gaitasunekin eta makila horiekin zubi bat eraiki dezakezu?

game_lang_code: Help the beetles cross the puddles
Have you fixed up a bridge for us?
Oh well, you take your time.
EU: Oh, ongi da, hartu behar duzun astia.

game_lang_code: We ain't in any rush.
Let's give this a go then!
Well, that was a bit rocky for my tastes.
EU: Oi ez, bide hori malkartsuegia da niretzako.

game_lang_code: Cheers for trying though!
Let us know if you wanna give it another try.
Well thank you so much little spider!
We can head on up now... after a little rest.
EU: Orain gorantz abia gaitezke... atsedenalditxo baten ostean.

game_lang_code: We won't beat you to the top, but you'll see our friends!
EU: Ez gara zurekin igoko goraino, baina bertan aurkituko dituzu gure lagunak!

game_lang_code: You tell em Wendy and Michael sent you.
EU: Esaiezu Wendy eta Michaelen partez zoazela.

game_lang_code: They'll be able to get you all the dung you need!
EU: Behar duzun beste gorotz eman ahalko dizute!

game_lang_code: Thank you friend!
You should head up to the top of the hill n' get yourself some dung!
EU: Infernuko maldaren gaineraino abiatu beharko zenuke, eta zuretzako gorotz apur bat eskuratu!

game_lang_code: Can't go wrong with dung!
EU: Gorotza lortuz gero, ez duzu hutsik egingo!

game_lang_code: Howdy, spider!
Wendy and Mike sent you did they?
EU: Wendy eta Mikeren partez zatoz, ezta?

game_lang_code: You must be here for the bounty of dung!
We got some for ya right on over here.
EU: Zuretzako pilotxo bat daukagu hemen gordeta.

game_lang_code: Only problem is this dung is a little TOO comforting.
EU: Arazo bakarra da gorotza HAIN dela erosoa...

game_lang_code: Our lazy son is simply refusing to leave the ball!
EU: Gure seme nagiak uko egiten dio bola askatzeari!

game_lang_code: It's so hot out there! Why would I want to leave?
EU: Kanpoan egiten duen bero sargoriarekin... zergatik utzi beharko nuke bola?

game_lang_code: Little spider, It's all yours if you can convince him to get out and see a bit of the world.
EU: Armiarmatxo, hortik atera eta mundua ezagutzeko konbentzitzen baduzu, bola zurea da.

game_lang_code: Go on... give it a little push!
Little spider, you're back!
We can't thank you enough for helping our son find his feet.
EU: Bihotzez eskertzen dizugu semea zentzatzen laguntzeagatik.

game_lang_code: We miss him of course, but we're so glad he has good friends like you.
EU: Bere falta sumatzen dugu, noski, baina pozgarria da zu moduko lagun onak dituela jakitea.

game_lang_code: Tell him to come visit when he has time, Okay?
EU: Esaiozu astia duenean bisitan etortzeko, ados?

game_lang_code: Did I seriously just get kicked out of home???
EU: Zer?? Benetan etxetik ostikoz atera nautela???

game_lang_code: I'll just have to live here now I guess??
EU: Beraz, hemen bizi beharko naiz orain??

game_lang_code: Help yourself to some dung. It's my favourite!
EU: Hartu gorotz pixkat zuretzat. Nire gogokoena da!

game_lang_code: Very energy dense!
Help yourself to some dung, neighbour!
Fresh dung is the best dung!
Pushing a great big ball of dung is one of the best workouts!
EU: Ez dago gorotz bola handi bat bultzatzea baino ariketa hoberik!

game_lang_code: Hey there friend!
Welcome to Dungtown!
Heeeyyy! Wassup my dude?
You like my super secret chill-out zone?
EU: Gustatzen zaizu erlaxatzeko prestatu dudan leku super sekretu hau?

game_lang_code: That's awesome, dude.
You can hang here like all day if you want!
EU: Nahi baduzu egun osoa pasa dezakezu hemen!

game_lang_code: Keep it chill my dude!
Heya skater girl!
It me, skatebirb!
I been tryin teach all dem ants to skate.
EU: Iñurri guzti hoiei skatean ibiltzen erakusten ai naun.

game_lang_code: Dey got de right attitude, but... still working on technique.
EU: Yarrera egokia diten, bañaa... teknika exkaxaaa.

game_lang_code: U wanna show dem how it's done??
Heck yes!
Clear de park, ants! We about to see some sick moves!
EU: Hustu pista, iñurriak! Oain mugimendu zoroooak ikusiko ttuzue!

game_lang_code: U ready to skate??
Sick! Let's get u ur board!
Okies, u come back whenever u feel like skating!
EU: Itzel, buelta hadi irrixtatzeko prest hagoanean!

game_lang_code: Gnarly Mate!
That bird is a ripper skater!
I'm always doing a boneless!
Get it... ?
This park is so rad!
This park is so secret!
No posers ever find it!
EU: Itxurati harroputzek ez dute inoiz aurkituko!

game_lang_code: Hey pal!
You got a minute?
We were working on a new tunnel here when the roof caved in.
EU: Tunel batean lanean ari ginen, eta lurjausi bat egon da.

game_lang_code: My Comrades are heading back to get more supplies now,
EU: Burkideak hornigai bila joan dira bueltan,

game_lang_code: but our spider-bot is still stuck under the rubble!
EU: baina gure armiarmabot-a hondakinen pean harrapatua dago!

game_lang_code: Think you could help me hoist him out of there?
Recover the spider-bot
Can you help me hoist the bot out of this rubble?
Thanks bud.
Those old bots are real hard to replace.
EU: Robot zahar hauek ordezkatzea oso zaila izaten da.

game_lang_code: You're a lifesaver!
I'm just keeping watch of the worksite while I wait for more supplies.
EU: Lan-eremua zaintzen ari naiz, hornigaiak iritsi bitartean.

game_lang_code: zhoooOOOOM!
[GREETINGS STRANGER]
[GREETINGS ENGINEER]
[YOUR RESCUE IS APPRECIATED]
[THIS SPIDERBOT HAS BEEN DAMAGED]
[PLEASE RETURN TO BASE FOR REPAIRS]
Little spider!
How's your boyfriend going?
A prime opportunity just opened up since we sent that nasty bird away.
EU: Aukera interesgarri bat sortu zaigu txoritzar gorrotagarri hura uxatu dugunetik.

game_lang_code: I'm going to build my new hive on the magic island!
EU: Nire erlauntza berria uharte magikoan eraikiko dut!

game_lang_code: Isn't that exciting??
Anyway, I'm glad I caught you here. I was just about to head out!
EU: Edonola ere, pozten nau zu hemen aurkitu izanak. Harantz abiatzear nago!

game_lang_code: I'll see you around, buddy.
I'll see you around,  princess spider.
Don't go on any big adventures without me!
EU: Ez zaitez abentura handietara abiatu ni gabe!

game_lang_code: Hi buddy! It's so good to see you.
EU: Kaixo, adiskide! Pozgarria da zu ikustea.

game_lang_code: I hope the two of you are settling back in okay.
EU: Espero dut zuok biok lasaitasunera bueltatuko zinetela.

game_lang_code: Lovely to have a bit of peace at the old tree again.
EU: Ederra da zuhaitz zaharra berriro bakean ikustea.

game_lang_code: That was more than enough adventure for my lifetime!
EU: Nik behintzat nahikoa abentura izan dut bizi osorako!

game_lang_code: Wasn't that a cool mission?
EU: Misio txundigarria izan da hau, ezta?

game_lang_code: Did you see me pulling the balloon?
I was all BZZZZZ, and you were all ZOOOOM, ZAP!
EU: Hor nenbilen ni, BZZZZZ, eta gero zuk ZOOOOM, ZAP!

game_lang_code: It was awesome!
Thanks for helping me leave the old dung ball.
EU: Milesker gorotz bola zaharra uzten laguntzeagatik.

game_lang_code: This whole outside world thing is so much more fun than I thought!
EU: Kanpoko mundu hau uste baino dibertigarriagoa da!

game_lang_code: Let me know when the next mission is gonna be.
I'm gonna be the muscle!
Oh hey there!
I was just debriefing Carl here about our airship trip!
EU: Carli aireontziko txangoaren berri ematen nenbilen!

game_lang_code: She's got some new plans brewing!
Comrade Vlad has collected a lot of useful data for us.
EU: Vlad burkideak informazio erabilgarri mordoa bildu du guretzako.

game_lang_code: If we can better integrate the heated airship technology into the Mech-Ant,
EU: Aire bero bidezko aireontziaren teknologia Inurri Mekanikoarekin integratuz...

game_lang_code: we'll be able to deploy ground defenses against the fire ants at a moment's notice!
EU: ... suzko inurrien aurkako lurreko defentsak aktibatu ahalko ditugu istantean.

game_lang_code: There's still some details to work out. But I think she's onto something with this.
EU: Jorratu beharreko xehetasunak daude oraindik. Baina uste dut bide onetik goazela.

game_lang_code: We couldn't have done it without you, Comrade!
EU: Ez genuke zu gabe halakorik lortuko, burkide!

game_lang_code: Mhhmm, you've been very helpful, Engineer.
EU: Mhhmm, oso lagungarria izan zara guretzat, ingeniaria.

game_lang_code: I made the right decision with you.
EU: Erabaki zuzena hartu nuen zu onartzean.

game_lang_code: Good work, Comrade.
Keep it up.
When we hit the skies again I hope I'll have you by my side!
EU: Berriro aireratzen garenean nire alboan izango zaitudala espero dut!

game_lang_code: Comrade Spider!
Guard duty's been awfully quiet now that we have a Mech-Ant out on patrol.
EU: Zaintza-lanak izugarri erraztu dira Inurri Mekanikoa patruilatzen dabilenetik.

game_lang_code: If you see any little fire ants around, you let me know!
EU: Inguruan suzko inurririk ikusten baduzu, jakinarazi!

game_lang_code: Hellos there spider...
Be veeery veeery quiets
Don't scares the fffoods
Noisssy...
If I gives you a sssticker...
Will you be quiets then?
Noisssy spider...

context: Displayed before the main menu on Xbox

game_lang_code: When enabled you must press the weave button a second time to attach the other end of the web.
EU: Gaituz gero, amaraunaren beste ertza itsasteko bigarren aldiz sakatu beharko duzu botoia.

game_lang_code: Shows a dotted line when weaving webs.
EU: Marradun lerro bat erakusten du amaraunak ehuntzean.

game_lang_code: When disabled, a button press is required to eat flies.
EU: Desgaituz gero, euliak irensteko botoia sakatu beharko duzu.

game_lang_code: Turns all spiders into friendly blobs. Does not affect gameplay.
EU: Armiarma guztiak bolatxo lagunkoi bihurtzen ditu. Ez dio jokoari eragiten.
